short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your Facebook experience with automation tools to add friends, remove friends, cancel sent requests, auto react, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Facebook Diamond Tools Pro 💎👑, your all-in-one solution to manage your Facebook activities efficiently and effortlessly! Packed with a variety of automation powerful tools, this extension makes your Facebook experience smoother and more enjoyable. Here's what you can do with Facebook Diamond Tools Pro:

Features:

Add Friends 🧑‍🤝‍🧑➕
Automatically send friend requests to suggested users or group members.
Customize click intervals, friends per batch, and break intervals for seamless operation.
Set a stop time to control the duration of friend-adding sessions.

Remove Friends 🧑‍🤝‍🧑🗑️
Easily manage your friends list by removing users based on their status:
- Deactivated and Closed ⌚🔒: Remove friends who have both deactivated their accounts and had them closed by Facebook.
- Deactivated Only ⌚ (By your friend): Unfriend users who have only deactivated their accounts.
- Closed Only 🔒 (By Facebook): Remove friends whose accounts have been closed by Facebook.
- All Friends ⚠️: Remove all friends from your list to start fresh.

Bulk Extract Users IDs 🧑‍🤝‍🧑🪪
Easily gather user IDs from your social connections. This tool allows you to bulk extract IDs from group members, friends lists, or post reactions with just a click.

Cancel Sent Requests ⬆️❌
Automatically cancel sent friend requests to declutter your pending requests list.
Configure click intervals, requests per batch, and break intervals for optimal performance.
Set a stop time to limit the cancelation duration.

Accept Friend Requests 📩✅
Easily accept incoming friend requests with a single click.

Cancel Friend Requests 📩❌
Conveniently cancel pending friend requests from others.

Auto Posts Reaction 📝❤️
Automatically react to posts with likes, loves, and other emotions.

Remove Posts 📝🗑️
Clean up your profile by removing unwanted posts.

Auto Comments Reaction 💬❤️
Automatically react to comments on posts to engage with your friends and followers.

Auto Comments Reply 💬📢
Automatically reply to comments on your posts to keep the conversation going.

Remove Comments 💬🗑️
Delete unwanted comments on your posts to maintain a positive environment.

Hide Comments 💬👁️
Hide comments from your posts to control what is visible to others.

Show Profile ID 🪪
Toggle the display of profile IDs to easily get and copy any user ID.

All disabled tools are coming soon! ✨
